This is a doxygen tool for Unity. It only works for Windows since it uses external batch files. I have been inspired by http://www.jacobpennock.com/Blog/?p=629

para.emphasis: To use this tool you need to install:

listitem.para: A LaTeX to pdf tool - e.g. http://miktex.org/download
Remember to update miketex using Update(admin))
Install Ghostscript if needed - http://www.ghostscript.com/download/gsdnld.html (The MikTex uses this)
Remember to close and reopen Unity if you have it open to update environment variables.
Rename DoxyPDF.txt to DoxyPDF.bat in Doxygen\Editor\Resources

chapter.para: One thing that I have found out the hard way is that if you have deep file hearcies some times makeindex refman.idx rejects files. This is a known bug http://sourceforge.net/p/miktex/bugs/2144/

listitem.para: Fill in every thing in settings.
Remember to always use full paths to source in Doxygenwizard and they should have / not \ as fodler separator
